description: King Juan Carlos abdicated in 2014 but is once again in the spotlight over his financial dealings.
title: Spain's monarchy shaken by Juan Carlos's hidden Swiss fortune
title_page: Spain's monarchy shaken by Juan Carlos's hidden Swiss fortune - BBC News
maintext: But reports of millions of euros being delivered to the royal family's Zarzuela residence by Juan Carlos and his hired assistants - and the emergence of a new tape in which Ms zu Sayn-Wittgenstein stated that the former king used his wealth to pay for all of his family expenses "in cash" - do little to help King Felipe distance himself from the sins of his father.
